description: Encodes an ActionScript object graph to XML based on an XML schema.

members.description: Encodes an ActionScript value as XML. describes how to encode the value, or the name to be used for the encoded XML node when a type parameter is also specified. complexType definition that describes how to encode the value. schema to describe how to encode this value, a custom element definition can be provided.

values: value The ActionScript value to encode as XML.
name The QName of an XML Schema element that
type The QName of an XML Schema simpleType or
definition If neither a top-level element nor type exists in the
Returns an XML encoding of the given ActionScript value.

members.description: Resets the encoder to its initial state, including resetting any Schema scope to the top level.
The function to be used to escape XML special characters before encoding any simple content.

When strictNillability is set to true, null values are encoded according to XML Schema rules (requires nillable=true to be set in the definition). When strictNillability is set to false, null values are always encoded with the xsi:nil="true" attribute. The default is false.
